Reviews.Title: Do not purchase Element electronics products.
Reviews.Author: Drew Nuernberger
Reviews.Content: purchased this television from Target in November of 2013 and it went on the fritz in March 2014. I only get half a screen. I called Element and the only way they would honor the warranty is if I shipped it back to them, then they would send me a replacement. The catch is I had to pay the shipping charges, which for a 40" TV weighing approximately 30 lbs with packaging cost $70 and the price may even be more depending on where you live. They have no authorized repair dealerships anywhere. I would advise that you purchase your television from a more reputable manufacturer. You may pay a little more, but at least you know that you are getting a good quality product from a manufacturer who will stand behind it instead of behind you (If you know what I mean). Also, always check if there are factory repair dealerships in your area. But let me repeat DO NOT PURCHASE ANY PRODUCTS FROM ELEMENT ELECTRONICS!
